about_the_game:
Zhulu Chess is a strategic board game inspired by Go (Weiqi). Take on the role of two protagonists during China's Northern and Southern Dynasties period, waging war for their respective kingdoms.

At its core, this is a perfect information strategy game where you'll freely choose your forces, solve tactical puzzles, and outmaneuver your opponents. Featuring a prediction system similar to "Into the Breach", you can challenge yourself with higher difficulties for a true feast of strategic thinking.

Start with an initial commander and army, gather resources through battles, build a powerful force, and face the ultimate Boss.

Perfect Information Gameplay

Once a battle begins, there are no random elements.

Victory is determined from the very first move - every action requires careful deliberation to achieve triumph.

In each battle, you'll select 10 pieces to deploy against your opponent.

Infantry, cavalry, archers... each piece type possesses unique characteristics.

Instant Game-Changing Reversals

Zhulu Chess incorporates mechanics from the traditional Chinese board game - Go.

The concept of "Qi" from Go serves as a core mechanic in the game.

Liberty = Piece's Defense - Incoming Attack Power

Once an attacking piece is repelled, the crisis is immediately resolved.

Thus, the tide of battle can turn in an instant - caution is essential.

Enemy Intent

The game features a prediction system similar to "Into the Breach", revealing enemy actions for the next turn.

It's up to your skill whether to disrupt their plans or turn them to your advantage.

Challenge Mode

True difficulty isn't just about increasing numbers.

In Challenge Mode, you can no longer predict enemy intentions.

Now, think and decide like a master player facing AI.

Story Mode (In Development)

Experience dozens of story-driven missions.

Each mission features unique challenges, unlocking different starting items upon completion.

Your choices throughout the story missions will ultimately determine your protagonist's fate.
